com.jswiff.swfrecords.actions
Class Try

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.actions.Action
      com.jswiff.swfrecords.actions.Try
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class Try
extends Action

This action defines handlers for exceptional conditions (exceptions). After defining the mandatory try block, you can define a catch block and/or a finally block.

Performed stack operations: none

ActionScript equivalent: try..catch..finally keywords

Since:
SWF 7
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Try

public Try(short catchRegister)
Creates a new Try action. You can specify the register number the caught object is put into.

Parameters:
catchRegister - catch register number

Try

public Try(java.lang.String catchVar)
Creates a new Try action. You can specify a name of a variable the caught object is put into.

Parameters:
catchVar - catch variable name
Method Detail

public void addToCatch(Action action)
Adds a new action record to the catch block.

Parameters:
action - an action record

addToFinally

public void addToFinally(Action action)
Adds a new action record to the finally block.

Parameters:
action - an action record

addToTry

public void addToTry(Action action)
Adds a new action record to the try block.

Parameters:
action - an action record

catchInRegister

public boolean catchInRegister()
Checks if the catched exception is put into a register or into a variable.

Returns:
true if exception is catched into a register, else false

getCatchBlock

public ActionBlock getCatchBlock()
Returns the catch action block. Use addToCatchBlock() method to add new action records to the catch action block.

Returns:
catch action block

getCatchRegister

public short getCatchRegister()
Returns the number of the register the exception is catched into.

Returns:
catch variable name

getCatchVariable

public java.lang.String getCatchVariable()
Returns the name of the variable the exception is catched into.

Returns:
catch variable name

getFinallyBlock

public ActionBlock getFinallyBlock()
Returns the finally action block. Use addToFinallyBlock() method to add new action records to the finally action block.

Returns:
finally action block

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns the size of this action record in bytes.

Overrides:
getSize in class Action
Returns:
size of this record
See Also:
Action.getSize()

getTryBlock

public ActionBlock getTryBlock()

Returns the try action block. Use addToTryBlock() method to add new action records to the try action block.

Note: if a catch block is present, the try block contains an implicit Jump at the end pointing at the first action after the catch block, causing it's actions to be skipped in case no exception is thrown.

Returns:
try action block

hasCatchBlock

public boolean hasCatchBlock()
Checks if there is a catch block.

Returns:
true if there is a catch block, otherwise false

hasFinallyBlock

public boolean hasFinallyBlock()
Returns the finally action block. Can be used to add new actions to the finally block.

Returns:
the finally action block
